Webline Services has a wide portfolio of hosting services such as Shared hosting, Ecommerce Hosting, Master Reseller,Reseller, VPS, and Dedicated servers in both Linux and Windows platforms! We also have domain registrations, and SSL's . We have our own inhouse datacenters as well as bilingual staff.

Our OpenVZ Linux VPS is only $5 and you can get it with kloxo control panel 

Server specifications and pricing details are as below

OpenVZ Starter

512 MB guaranteed RAM 2 CPU core 30 GB space 1000 GB monthly bandwidth 1 Ipv4 address and Ipv6 available

Monthly Price : $5.00 Promo 

Promotions are available everyday. Just talk to one of our sales reps.

PayPal & Credit Card

For any questions related to our services or promotional offers, please send us an email to sales@webline-services.com or initiate a Live chat from [here](http://www.webline-services.com)
